message: Let's start fair. I'm offering you 40% of the money.  It's a good starting point, don't you think?
Your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Time is money, and we both lose value as this drags on.
Okay, let's be reasonable. A 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money now.  We both lose value with each passing round, so let's end this before things get worse.
